snippet.title: Space Boat Trailer
snippet.description:
Space Boat is an investigative narrative adventure that takes place in an imaginative universe with colorful characters.

While exploring the world, players will speak to NPCs, find key items, and take note of important clues. Players will unlock new dialogue options, enjoy story-driven cinematics, and solve puzzles that will help advance the main plot.

Come aboard and join us!
http://spaceboat.ca/twitter
